title: John Mulaney | Amber's Minute of Fury: Texas’ Abortion Ban
description:
Amber Ruffin focuses a minute of fury on the Texas heartbeat bill becoming law, making it illegal to get an abortion at six weeks or later.

Then, John Mulaney tells Seth about his eventful year.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
